title: My Email has been Hacked how can i change it?
body: My Email was just hacked into and after changing all my personal information to other sources i went to switch out my League of legends account email. However, the only way to switch out of it is to send a link to your current email which is redundant because my current email has already been hacked into. I have My Accounts Username and password but i need to change the email how can i do this without having access to my current email? I do not want to lose my account.

replies.body: Have you sent a Ticket to the Riot Support already?
Yes, though i thought i would ask anyway

We can only assist with this sort of thing via the support ticket you submitted. Just as a heads-up, you'll likely experience a bit longer than normal wait times for a reply on your ticket, as we've had a lot of tickets submitted recently.

Let me know if you have any questions.
